title: (x) 'Brookdale Lodge': Brush script Font - lettering, alternatives {Tiffany, Mike Y}
content:
Brookdale Lodge - script font

Who knows?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202110011im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brook_4895.jpg)
author: MargotHoltman

comments.content:
That is lettering. But you might find something similar looking through:

- Studio Lettering at House Industries  
- Bluemlein Scripts on Veer
In fact, if you used Mr. Dafoe and just faked the upright you'd be pretty close.

I imagine this lettering has been around for as long as I have been alive :-)

Michael

Jason Walcott at Veer also has done some revivals of this sort of brush script lettering. For example, his [Happy Hour](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202110011/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=JBT0000075) is similar I think.

- Mike Yanega
